nl.uva.science.wsdtf.io
Class Connector

java.lang.Object
  nl.uva.science.wsdtf.io.Connector

public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides connections with the StreamClientImpl or StreamServerImpl client. This class should only provide byte[] to its stream (in or out)
